title: Hate on him all you want, but Zed fulfill his thematic goals better than any other champion
body:
["Balance is weakness."](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/ca/Zed.move8.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121119061402)
["Balance is a fool's master."](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/e/eb/Zed.move5.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121119061402)
"Balance is a lie."

http://pa1.narvii.com/5758/4daff6bfd580a49cbe78983940d8501603ee383d_hq.gif

replies.body: Just put Qss back to its former glory none will give a fk about zed Hue

No thanks I don't like having my ult as Mordekaiser completely negated by a relatively cheap item.

https://media.giphy.com/media/SXcgjAPQnWOhW/giphy.gif
{{champion:8}} {{item:3123}}  much
What item is that?
i think it's force of nature
No no, its gotta be a Leviathan.
eleisa's miracle
Ionic Spark?
It's obviously Hearth of Gold
No, its obviously Sword of the Occult
It is the Divine Sword.

you all got it wrong guys, its death fires torch.

awesome i got downvoted for typo, Grasp* then ya asshats. smh
NOPE, that's DEFINITELY Atma's Impaler!!!

It's Blue Pill!

#OnlyAlphaPlayersWillKnow

nobody even builds that item anyways

ADCs especially, they never do it when it's needed
Because they are dumb if vlad goes fed and they dont build it
Nononono, it's just that they can't carry without their core build kappa
Meanwhile the one time I was Mundo top-lane, Irelia rushed it and screwed me over.

What is that item? I have never once seen someone build it!
http://img.pandawhale.com/post-27873-joey-from-friends-eyes-wide-op-gcTr.gif

I don't like my kit being evaporised by one Yasuo's ability and yet I must cope with it.
I want someone else to suffer too.

I'm a god damn Mordekaiser main I can't think of any other main who's suffered more than us.

http://i.imgur.com/sOcdXxM.jpg?noredirect
{{champion:83}}{{champion:6}}  You sure?

Tahm's been sitting on some of the worst winrates in the game, and currently struggles as both a support and a top laner. At least Morde is getting noticed nowadays and has a promised rework.

I agree the Morde rework was shitty but he's doing better than a lot of other champions right now.

Yeah, because nobody disliked Zed before the QSS changes.
https://67.media.tumblr.com/94561ac257f654fa2dbcba87b2dc0694/tumblr_nuc12vZWNH1uf7ihxo1_500.gif
i hated him his lore and his charter model also i think every ablitly in his kit besides W is genric
i still like him to this day :3 i just cant fucking play him lategame he is sluggier than a maokai feelsbad (or does it feelsgood)
New Zed Passive: If the match lasts longer than 40 mins he turns into {{champion:56}}
They took Shedder of TMNT and gave him a teleport. What thematic goals?

> [{quoted}](name=Seraphim117,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TjrUyhBt,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-12T14:10:07.192+0000)
>
> They took Shedder of TMNT and gave him a teleport. What thematic goals?

http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/1415/iqmtjfcdeyrlv.gif

I realize this is a joke about balance, but I think the OP is right. Zed really kills the evil ninja fantasy and is very satisfying and fun to play.

Well designed champ, everyone who wants him nerfed are just noobs eho don't buy qss

> [{quoted}](name=redfeenix,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TjrUyhBt,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-12T14:05:30.435+0000)
>
> I realize this is a joke about balance, but I think the OP is right. Zed really kills the evil ninja fantasy and is very satisfying and fun to play.
> 
> Well designed champ, everyone who wants him nerfed are just noobs eho don't buy qss

QSS can't cancel his ult now if I recall correctly.
If Zed'll let you recall at all
Fk zed then

> everyone who wants him nerfed are just noobs eho don't buy qss

You *do* know that QSS no longer removes his ult right?
Fuck. I've still been building it vs Zed's I'm retarded ( or just silver)
I resent this statement as I am a Silver V monkey and know not to build ~~QQQ~~ QSS to remove Zed and Fizz ults :[
It does remove Fizz ult though because it has a slow attached to it.
I'm pretty sure they removed dropping the Fizz ult part. It removes the slow that the ult has but not the ult itself. But then again, I'm but a lowly Silver V so what do I know? :P
What makes him fill his thematic goals?

["Ignorance is fatal."](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/dc/Zed.attack9.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121119061143)

http://pa1.narvii.com/5783/3cc0745cb841350bb912f29e7610ef22b36d737d_hq.gif

Akali is better:
So many noobs, will match making ever find true balance?
I still wish his ult killed him. it's a forbidden technique, why is it so good.
No technique is forbidden. {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}}{{champion:238}}{{champion:238}}{{champion:238}}{{champion:238}}{{champion:238}}{{champion:238}}

Because what idiot would commit suicide to maybe kill 1 person.

Maybe if it cost 10% current health like a {{champion:36}}.  (Yes IK his is 20)

Specifically I wish It procced on him and his target unless he killed his target. raise skill floor by making him literally useless unless you know what to do, and it makes him need to commit.

The reason why people hate zed is his safety, well the best way to fix that would be to make his all in literally an all in.
Imagine the compensation buffs tho
It's forbidden because it's good...
It could be forbidden for being so good at murder.
http://adammclane.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/fulcrum-1.jpg
